description: When running a Python program that uses matplotlib, a runtime error is encountered that says "TypeError: 'module' object is not callable". This occurs when the code attempts to call a module as if it were a function, which is not allowed in IdiomaticPython.
output:
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
  File "<stdin>", line 2, in main
NameError: name 'display_' is not defined
